name: Duckmesion
description:
You want to play as a Cookie lovin' Duck?

In Duckmesion you can jump, and change dimesion, going tru simple puzzels!

Your goal is to get The Cookie!

The pack include:

  • game itself
  • earlier demos
  • concept art
  • bugs from development
  • game soundtrack in mp3
  •  first build

the game is going to recive updates after some time

The game in demo is an earlier version

the game is paid
